model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the game board.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int SIZE
      The size of the gameboard.
      int TOTALMINES
      The total amount of mines that will be placed at the start of the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board(int m)
      Constructs a new board

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<Cell> getCellsWithMines()
      Returns the set of all cells that have mines.
      java.util.Set<Cell> getFlaggedCells()
      Returns the set of all cells that have been flagged.
      Cell[][] getGrid()
      Returns the grid associated with this board
      int getMinesLeft()
      Returns the number of mines left on the board.
      boolean hasBeenSolved()
      Checks to see whether the board has been solved
      void placeFlag(Cell c)
      Places a flag on the cell.
      void placeMines()
      Places mines randomly in the grid.
      void removeFlag(Cell c)
      Undoes the effects of placeFlag()

        The size of the gameboard.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board(int m)
        Constructs a new board
        Parameters:
        m - the number of mines to be placed on the board

    • Method Detail

      • hasBeenSolved

        public boolean hasBeenSolved()
        Checks to see whether the board has been solved
        Returns:
        true if all mine cells have been flagged and false otherwise

      • getGrid

        public Cell[][] getGrid()
        Returns the grid associated with this board
        Returns:
        the grid of cells

      • placeMines

        public void placeMines()
        Places mines randomly in the grid. Checks to prevent duplicates.

      • placeFlag

        public void placeFlag(Cell c)
        Places a flag on the cell. Decrements the number of remaining mines for this board. NOTE: just because the number of remaining mines is decreased, it does not mean that each flag is actually a mine
        Parameters:
        c - the cell that is to be flagged

      • removeFlag

        public void removeFlag(Cell c)
        Undoes the effects of placeFlag()
        Parameters:
        c - the cell that is to be unflagged.

      • getMinesLeft

        public int getMinesLeft()
        Returns the number of mines left on the board.
        Returns:
        the number of mines remaining on the board

      • getCellsWithMines

        public java.util.Set<Cell> getCellsWithMines()
        Returns the set of all cells that have mines.
        Returns:
        a set of all cells that have mines

      • getFlaggedCells

        public java.util.Set<Cell> getFlaggedCells()
        Returns the set of all cells that have been flagged.
        Returns:
        a set of all cells that have been flagged
